ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Selos breaking root was not a bug
ygData.msgSnippet: hm going to have to try that...  On the other hand, just get your magic resist up if you re going to be the puller. Minkin Bard of 80 magic resist Hasnt been
ygData.messageBody:
hm going to have to try that... On the other hand, just get your magic
resist up if you're going to be the puller.

Minkin
Bard of 80 magic resist
Hasnt been rooted in a few weeks due to resists

-----Original Message-----
From: Khelan [mailto:khelan@...]
Sent: January 11, 2001 8:35 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Selos breaking root was not a bug


You used to be able to break root quickly with Bellow (don't have it memmed
much anymore though). Don't know if they fixed it, but it's knock-back
component used to break root fast.

>>> Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4<g4mntofcr@...> 01/10/01
05:17PM >>>
Prior to yesterday's patch, if you had Selos running, and then you got
rooted, the next time Selos refreshed it would break the root (which I'm
sure everyone was already aware of). For this reason alone, bards were the
best class for pulling in PoG. Now if you get rooted, your stuck in place
until roots wears off or until you cancel magic it away. This change is
contrary to what GZ stated a long time ago on how the song was intended to
work. I only assume that whoever replaced GZ as spell system designer was
not aware of this.

Galtin of E'ci


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
